item.description:
Ah, yes! It's that time againâ€”to pay homage to the Irish, or succumb to the temptation to find your best Emerald Isle accent at the bottom of a pint glass. Whatever the reason, join us as we celebrate St. Patrick's Day on March 20th from 2 - 5 p.m. in Kenmore Square.

The event is open to ALL group members, plus 3 non-member pals. But there's a catch; RSVPs must be in by March 17 (the real St. Patrick's Day). Cost is $5 per person to cover tax + gratuity. The venue will graciously serve up some appetizers for us.

As always, there will be at least one raffle prize. Maybe more, since I'm feelin' festive. ;-)

Tell your friends. Share this on Facebook. Let's make our first-ever St. Pat's Celebration one for the history books!

Cheers,
Alicia

Get in the mood by watching this:
http://vimeo.com/6332...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll have space reserved just for us.
item.name: Luck o' the Irish Celebration
